LanguageData.CP_MustPlaceOnDiggableResources: This needs to be built on diggable resources (dirt, clay, sand, gravel).
LanguageData.CP_UpgradeConfirmationDialog:
Are you sure you want to upgrade the {0} to a {1}? This action will remove the {0} and cannot be undone.
If you do not have the materials to build a {1}, choose "{3}" \n Materials needed to upgrade: \n{2}
LanguageData.CP_WaterError: Drawing water we don't have from
LanguageData.CP_MustBePlacedOnWall: {0} must be placed on a wall.
LanguageData.CP_MustPlaceUnThickroofed: Can't place under a thick roof.
LanguageData.CP_WindowBlocksPlacement: {0} cannot be placed on a window.
LanguageData.CP_SealBarrelDesc: Seal the barrel to prevent evaporation
LanguageData.CP_UnsealBarrelDesc: Unseal the barrel to fill with water
LanguageData.CP_EmptyTankDesc: Gather water into buckets to be hauled away.
LanguageData.CP_TooManyBuckets: There are currently too many buckets at the {0}. Haul existing buckets away.
